Winged Spirit Strike.name: Winged Spirit Strike
Winged Spirit Strike.flavor: The spirit of a bird of prey dives on your enemy, leaving your foe vulnerable to your allies’ attacks.
Winged Spirit Strike.onHit: Wisdom modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, any ally can score a critical hit against the target on a roll of 16–20.

Flurry of Spirit Talons.name: Flurry of Spirit Talons
Flurry of Spirit Talons.flavor: In a burst of supernatural speed, your spirit companion flashes among your enemies, leaving them gashed, staggered, and vulnerable to attack.
Flurry of Spirit Talons.effect: Until the end of the encounter or until your spirit companion disappears, you and your allies can score critical hits on a roll of 18–20 against any creature that is adjacent to your spirit companion. Then make the following attack.
Flurry of Spirit Talons.onHit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier damage. If you score a critical hit with the attack, the target is also dazed (save ends).

Hunting Eagle.name: Hunting Eagle
Hunting Eagle.flavor: You send your spirit companion to your ally’s aid. It flies around your ally’s target, making that foe easier for your ally to attack.
Hunting Eagle.trigger: An ally adjacent to your spirit companion makes an attack roll for a ranged or an area attack
Hunting Eagle.effect: You move your spirit companion to a square adjacent to a target of the attack. The triggering ally gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll against each target adjacent to your spirit companion.
